question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. coffee cup
B. pepper
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The pepper shaker is positioned further back on the table relative to the coffee cup, which is closer to the foreground, making its 3D depth relationship discernible without a depth map.
